description: Create a mystical landing page with dark cosmic theme. At the top, show a dramatic hero section with the cloaked messenger image (cloaked-messenger-portrait-KakJfYU78kjRavrkE3GIf.png) and text that says 'IT'S NO COINCIDENCE YOU'RE HERE' in glowing neon letters. Below that, add mysterious text: 'I AM... intercepting your frequency. You clicked because your soul remembers. This is your first step out of the simulation.' Include a glowing CTA button that says 'BEGIN AWAKENING'. Use deep space purple and blue colors with matrix-style glowing effects. Add subtle animation to text and buttons.

Create a phone-hack style funnel page that looks like secret messages being texted. Use the phone-hack-interface image as background inspiration. Show conversation-style messages that appear like texts: 'Incoming transmission...', 'Your frequency detected...', 'Initiating soul scan...', 'MATCH FOUND: Cosmic Warrior Soul'. Add glowing cipher symbols and matrix code effects. Include a 'DECRYPT MESSAGE' button that leads to the next step. Make it feel like someone is hacking into their phone to deliver divine messages.

Create a book series showcase page for 'Cosmic Soul Quest'. Show book cover placeholder with title and description: 'A teenage boy discovers his soul is from another dimension. He's part of an ancient group of seven cosmic warriors who must reunite to save Earth's frequency from collapsing into the void. Blending quantum physics with ancient mysticism, this series will awaken your true cosmic identity.' Add 'GET BOOK NOW' button with pricing options. Use cosmic-quantum-background image.

Create a section for Galactic Star Crystal Academy. Show mystical-physics-symbols image as background. Add heading 'GALACTIC STAR CRYSTAL ACADEMY' with description: 'Advanced training for awakened souls. Learn the seven secret steps to remember who you truly are. Master quantum manifestation and cosmic frequency alignment.' Include 'JOIN ACADEMY' CTA button and space for pricing tiers.

Add a multi-step funnel flow. Create Step 1: Secret Code Entry (looks like entering a passcode on phone), Step 2: Soul Recognition (personality quiz style), Step 3: Frequency Match (reveals their cosmic warrior archetype), Step 4: Awakening Offer (book + academy bundle with countdown timer). Each step should feel like unlocking classified information.

Add social media integration section in footer with icon links for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook. Add email signup form styled like 'encrypted communication channel'. Include contact section that says 'ESTABLISH DIRECT FREQUENCY LINK' instead of normal contact form.
Change the text 'THE AWAKENING' to 'DISCOVERY' in the book showcase section
Update the Instagram social media link in the footer to link to @Cosmic_soul_quest Instagram profile (https://instagram.com/Cosmic_soul_quest)

Add prominent Instagram branding throughout the site. In the hero section, add text above the main headline that says 'FROM INSTAGRAM: @Cosmic_soul_quest' with the Instagram logo. Make it look like this content is being delivered through Instagram.

Add Instagram story-style progress bars at the very top of the page to make it feel like viewing Instagram stories. Add Instagram UI elements like the share arrow, three dots menu, and heart icon in the top right corner.
Convert all CTA buttons to say 'TAP TO CONTINUE' or 'SWIPE UP' instead of generic button text, matching Instagram story interaction patterns. Make buttons look more like Instagram story tap areas.

Add 'Link in Bio' style section that shows @Cosmic_soul_quest with a list of clickable links: 'Read the Book', 'Join Academy', 'Start Awakening Journey', 'Contact'. Style it exactly like an Instagram bio link page (Linktree style).

Add Instagram-style engagement prompts throughout: 'Double tap if you feel this ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'Tag someone who needs to see this üëá', 'Share this to your story ‚ú®', 'DM me AWAKEN to start üì©'. Place these strategically between sections.

Make the phone-hack funnel section look like Instagram DMs. Show it as a conversation thread with @Cosmic_soul_quest sending messages. Add Instagram DM UI elements like the camera icon, info button, and message input bar at the bottom.

Add Instagram feed section to the homepage that displays recent posts from @Cosmic_soul_quest. Include a grid of Instagram post placeholders with hover effects. Add 'Follow on Instagram' button that links to the profile.

Add Instagram share buttons throughout the site. When users click 'Share to Instagram Story', it should prepare the content for sharing. Add social share buttons for each major section (book, academy, funnel results) with Instagram-optimized formatting.

Create a 'Download for Instagram' feature on the funnel completion page. When users finish the soul quiz and get their archetype, add a button to download a custom Instagram story graphic showing their result that they can share.
Add Instagram-optimized meta tags and Open Graph tags so when the website link is shared on Instagram, it shows the mystical cloaked messenger image with compelling preview text.

Remove ALL Instagram-style UI elements from the website. Remove: Instagram story bars at top, Instagram DM interface, Instagram feed section, Instagram engagement prompts, Instagram share buttons, Link in Bio section, any '@' mentions or Instagram logos. Keep the mystical phone-hack theme but make it look like a divine/cosmic transmission, not Instagram.

Update the hero section to feature the cloaked messenger image (cloaked-messenger-portrait-KakJfYU78kjRavrkE3GIf.png) prominently as the divine 'I AM' messenger. Make it look like he is speaking directly to the viewer through their screen. Add glowing effects around him. The message should say 'IT'S NO COINCIDENCE YOU CLICKED HERE... I've been waiting for you.' with mysterious divine energy effects.

Redesign the phone-hack funnel section to look like a mysterious cosmic transmission, NOT Instagram DMs. Show it as encrypted divine messages appearing on a phone screen with matrix code and sacred geometry. Messages should feel like they're coming from a higher dimensional being, not a social media account.

Update the footer to have simple social media icon links (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube) without any Instagram-specific styling. Add a simple email signup form. Keep the cosmic/mystical theme consistent throughout.
